reviewText: Wonderful Comedy, Old time favorite. Love it.

Hi,  I purchased this dvd as a gift for my Mom, who loves these old movies.  She use to have lot's of them on vhs, but is now trying to replace them with dvd's.  I found this one, which was a combination of both Abbott & Costello and Laurel & Hardy movies.  It has two movies of each one, for a total of four different movies.  Of course, they are in black and white, except for one Abbott & Costello movie which is in color.  But, my Mom doesn't mind because that's the way she saw them originally.  She really enjoys seeing these old movies, and this was a great find for her collection.  A great dvd collection!
Old comedy and still funny. The things they used to do to make you laugh. Hey ABBOTT !!!! It's to bad they didn't make more movies.
A good family viewing DVD, by some of the greatest! We really enjoy watching the old time movies, for their simplicity, and that we don't have to worry about content with younger relatives.
Great combo of laughter and nostalgia!  I recommend this to anyone who remembers the comedy of Abbot & Costello and Laurel & Hardy.
